title: The Nothing Place
description: Ash Bennett is living a secret life full of too many lies. The Lost Son of planet Th’rann has been found, and the entire game has changed.When an attack occurs on the Bennett ranch, Ash’s neatly ordered world begins to unravel. Paul Bennett has questions. A friend goes missing. Conflict and betrayal in the inner circle. Ash’s own mindscape is under siege.The pressure to leave planet Earth for Th’rann grows by the day, and Ash can’t seem to find a way to stop the inevitable.Can Ash and his friends survive the mounting problems at hand? Will he find an unlikely ally in enemy territory? And most importantly, will he be able to keep his life with his dad on Bennett ranch untouched by the chaos of two warring planets galaxies away?
author: L.A. Goodman
